q.one: How does the logo design process work?
q.six: How will communication work during the project?
q.eight: What is your cancellation and refund policy?
q.nine: Is my data safe with you?
q.ten: How can I file a complaint?
q.eleven: What happens if we canâ€™t reach an agreement?

a.one: We start by understanding your vision and brand goals, then present several design concepts. After you choose your preferred concept, we refine it until we achieve the final design.
a.two: Yes, all designs are 100% original and custom-made for your brand. No templates or copies are used.
a.three: Each package includes a specific number of free revisions
a.four: The cost depends on your chosen package. We require a 50% upfront payment to start the project, and the remaining 50% is due upon final delivery. Our pricing is transparent with no hidden fees. You can pay via cash, bank transfer, or electronic payment platforms.
a.five: Delivery time depends on the package you choose, ranging from 5 to 14 business days. If you need faster delivery, we offer an Express package. In case of any delays, we will inform you as soon as possible.
a.six: You can communicate via WhatsApp, email, or phone calls. You will have a dedicated project manager to update you and address your concerns.
a.seven: Once the full payment is made, the design becomes your complete property, and you can use it as you wish. We retain the right to display the design in our portfolio unless you request otherwise.
a.eight: You can cancel the order after work has begun, but a 50% deduction will be applied to cover operational costs. After the final delivery, no refunds can be issued.
a.nine: Absolutely! We are committed to protecting your data and will not share it with any third parties. Your information is used solely to complete the agreed-upon work.
a.ten: You can submit your complaint via email or phone. We respond to all complaints within 48 business hours
a.eleven: We will attempt to resolve the dispute amicably. If no agreement is reached, we will resort to arbitration under the laws of the Arab Republic of Egypt

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using our services.

section1.minorRevisionsDescription: Include color changes, font adjustments, or moving simple elements.
section1.majorRevisionsDescription: Include complete redesigns, restructuring main elements, changing the logo, or adding entirely new elements.
section1.minorRevisionFee: $30 for each additional minor revision after exhausting the agreed number of revisions.
section1.majorRevisionFee: $50 to $150 for each major revision, depending on the scale and complexity of the changes.

section2.advancePaymentDescription1: 50% of the total amount is required as an advance before work begins.
section2.advancePaymentDescription2: The remaining 50% is due upon delivery of the final work.
section2.paymentMethodsDescription: Cash, bank transfer, or electronic payment platforms.

section3.noteDescription: Delivery timelines may be extended in case of additional revision requests or unforeseen circumstances. The client will be informed of any potential delays as soon as possible.
section3.fileDeliveryDescription: Final files will be delivered via email or file-sharing platforms. Files include: (PDF, PNG, JPEG) for designs, and (MP4, GIF) for animations.

section4.beforeWorkBeginsDescription: If the client cancels the order before work begins, 100% of the advance payment will be refunded.
section4.afterWorkBeginsDescription: If the client cancels the order after work begins, 50% of the total amount will be deducted. This covers part of the operational costs and time already invested.
section4.afterDeliveryDescription: No refunds will be issued after the final work has been delivered.

section5.clientRightsDescription: After full payment, the client has the right to use the designs as they see fit. We reserve the right to display the designs in our portfolio unless the client requests otherwise.
section5.sevenDesignStudioRightsDescription: We retain intellectual property rights to the designs until full payment is received.

section6.dataProtectionDescription: We are committed to protecting client data and will not share it with any third parties. Client data will only be used to execute the agreed-upon work.

section7.filingComplaintDescription: Clients can file complaints via email or phone. Complaints will be addressed within 48 working hours.
section7.disputeResolutionDescription: Any disputes will be resolved amicably. If no resolution is reached, arbitration will be sought by the laws of [Country].

section8.rightToAmendDescription: We reserve the right to amend this policy at any time. Clients will be informed of any changes via the website or email.

section9.agreementDescription: By proceeding with the work, the client agrees to all the terms and conditions outlined above.
